desc: Oak and Elizabeth is an online shop specializing in moms and relaxation. We believe in uplifting others, spreading kindness, and encourage self-care and our products of soy wax candles, all-natural body scrubs and bath salts, and body oils help with that. We also have a full line of mom and kids apparel.

layout.text: Our focus is on relaxation and celebrating you. We have the perfect gift with you in mind.
